mapper.select: SELECT per.personal_phone, per.personal_nickname, pi.pic_src, pi.pic_id FROM sps_shopkeeper_personal per LEFT JOIN sps_shopkeeper_pic pi ON per.shopkeeper_customerId=pi.shopkeeper_customerId WHERE per.personal_id=#{id}
SELECT personal_id, personal_client_name, personal_username, personal_idCard FROM sps_shopkeeper_personal WHERE shopkeeper_customerId=#{customerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sps_shopkeeper_pic SET pic_src=#{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE pic_id=#{id} AND pic_type=11
mapper.sql: personal_id, personal_client_name, personal_sex, personal_idCard, personal_idCard_validity_start, personal_idCard_validity_end, personal_licence_issuing_authority, personal_age, personal_marital_status, personal_phone, personal_phone_password, personal_placeOfDomicile, personal_living_condition, personal_living_condition_other, personal_living_province_name, personal_living_province_code, personal_living_city_name, personal_living_city_code, personal_living_area_name, personal_living_area_code, personal_living_address, personal_none_corp, personal_nickname, personal_username, personal_creat_time, personal_update_time, shopkeeper_customerId
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sps_shopkeeper_personal
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sps_shopkeeper_personal (personal_id, personal_client_name, personal_sex, personal_idCard, personal_idCard_validity_start, personal_idCard_validity_end, personal_licence_issuing_authority, personal_age, personal_marital_status, personal_phone, personal_phone_password, personal_placeOfDomicile, personal_living_condition, personal_living_condition_other, personal_living_province_name, personal_living_province_code, personal_living_city_name, personal_living_city_code, personal_living_area_name, personal_living_area_code, personal_living_address, personal_none_corp, personal_nickname, personal_username, personal_creat_time, personal_update_time, shopkeeper_customerId ) values (#{personalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personalClientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalIdcardValidityStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalIdcardValidityEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLicenceIssuingAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personalMaritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalPhonePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalPlaceofdomicile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingConditionOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingProvinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingProvinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalLivingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalNoneCorp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalCreatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{personalUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shopkeeperCustomerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
